casebody.data:
Christopher LEWIS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 12, 2018

Robert L. O'Brien, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Christopher Lewis' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 182 Conn. App. 901, 184 A.3d 840 (2018), is denied.
